name: UpdateTeamLink
description:
Updates a team link in Datadog.

Use this tool to update the details of a specific team link within the Datadog service. It's useful for modifying or adjusting link information associated with a team.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique string identifier for the team related to the link.

parameters.name: link_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the link you want to update.

parameters.name: link_label
parameters.description: Specify the label for the link. This is used to identify or name the link within the team's list of links.

parameters.name: link_url
parameters.description: The URL for the team link. Provide a valid, well-formed URL.

parameters.name: team_link_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of team link. Must be 'team_links'.

parameters.name: link_position
parameters.description: The position of the link in the list, used to sort links for the team.

value_schema.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team

parameters.name: team_id_associated_with_link
parameters.description: The ID of the team associated with the link to be updated.

value_schema.description: ID of the team the link is associated with

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.attributes.position
parameters.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team

value_schema.description: The link's position, used to sort links for the team

parameters.name: data.attributes.team_id
parameters.description: ID of the team the link is associated with

value_schema.description: ID of the team the link is associated with
